detectors.description:
PepperSwap.buyToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PepperSwap.sol#250-255) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PepperSwap.sol#252)
detectors.markdown:
